    • VaccineTrial

  • Method Details

    • addVolunteer

      public void addVolunteer​(java.lang.String id, boolean placebo)
      Adds a new VaccineTrialVolunteer to the trial
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the volunteer
      placebo - Whether the volunteer was given a placebo, or the actual vaccine

    • isMoreEffectiveThanLimit

      public boolean isMoreEffectiveThanLimit​(double limit)
      Returns whether the vaccine's effectiveness rate is higher than the provided limit. The effectiveness of the vaccine is calculated as follows: 1- (number of people that received the vaccine and got sick/number of people that got sick) If there is no sick people, the vaccine is not effective
      Parameters:
      limit - A limit to compare against
      Returns:
      Whether the vaccine effectiveness rate is higher than the limit
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If limit is not between (including) 0 and 1.

    • setSick

      public void setSick​(java.lang.String id)
      Updates the sick state of a VaccineTrialVolunteer
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the volunteer to set sick.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is no volunteer with the given id

    • getVolunteer

      public VaccineTrialVolunteer getVolunteer​(java.lang.String id)
      Get's the volunteer with the given ID
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the volunteer to set sick.
      Returns:
      The vaccine trial volunteer with the given ID. If the ID is not valid for any volunteer, return null

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
